channel.title: jan Sonja on lipu kule
channel.description: Recent content in jan Sonja on lipu kule

item.title: akesi pi ante kule
item.description: (mi jan sona akesi ala. mi sitelen musi taso.) akesi mute li lon. suno ni la mi wile toki lon akesi pi ante kule. jan mute li sona e ni: selo pi akesi ni li ken ante e kule ona. nasin seme la kule selo li kama ante? sina kepeken ilo lukin wawa la sina ken lukin pona e ijo pi lili mute. seme li lili mute lon selo kule pi akesi ni?
